content: Amazing, this reduced me to tears. Please do not let the scrappers get her, she needs reverence as a wargrave.

author: Phil
content:
The badly damaged
Lexington, nicknamed
“Lady Lex”, was
deliberately sunk by
another US warship at the
conclusion of the battle.
More than 200 members of
the crew died in the battle
but most were rescued by
other US vessels before the
Lexington was scuttled.
